div.span: 19. Remuneration which is taken into account for the exemption for voluntary overtime or net overtime hours in the public sector

div.div: a) Voluntary overtime worked from 01.07.2023 as part of the relaunch:
2) Overtime hours worked and paid from 01.07.2023
b) Voluntary overtime worked in 2022 as part of the recovery
2) Overtime hours worked in 2022 and paid in 2023
c) Provided in 2021 as part of the fight against COVID-19 and / or as part of the recovery plan or net overtime worked in 2021 in the public sector
- for overtime worked between 01.01.2021 and 30.06.2021 included with employers belonging to crucial sectors or in the public sector
- for overtime worked between 01.07.2021 and 31.12.2021 as part of the recovery plan
- provided from 01.01.2021 to 30.06.2021 inclusive with employers belonging to crucial sectors or in the public sector and paid in 2023
- provided from 01.07.2021 to 31.12.2021 included as part of the recovery plan and paid in 2023
